channel.title: How to make a working compiler
channel.description:
now i know all compilers i tried didnt work for me sooo i made my own here it is right click your compile.bot ( might have a different name such as compiler) press ctrl+a and then press backspace or delete then copy and paste this in your notepad then save it
@ECHO OFF title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
if you get an error code such as java isnt found you need to do this... download the latest version of java... ( use the link ) [url=http://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp]http://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp[/url] then install it.. now we need ot make your paths find your new version of java so open my computer right click then press properties then click the tab advaced and then environment variables [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/3971/untitledab3.png[/img][/URL] By [URL=http://profile.imageshack.us/user/mrtube]mrtube[/URL] then find the varilabe called Classpath or CLASSPATH open it and edit the variable value to
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin
then do the same for the variable called Path or PATH and your compile will work! if you get any errors tell me

item.title: How to make a working compiler
item.dc:creator: @mrtube mrtube
item.description:
@mrtube wrote:

now i know all compilers i tried didnt work for me sooo

i made my own here it is

right click your compile.bot ( might have a different name such as compiler)

press ctrl+a and then press backspace or delete then copy and paste this in your notepad then save it

@ECHO OFF title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

if you get an error code such as java isnt found you need to do this…

download the latest version of java…
( use the link )
http://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

then install it…

now we need ot make your paths find your new version of java so open my computer

right click then press properties then click the tab advaced and then environment variables


By mrtube

then find the varilabe called Classpath or CLASSPATH open it and edit the variable value to

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin

then do the same for the variable called Path or PATH and your compile will work!

if you get any errors tell me

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a working compiler
